regen.absent_element: error handling for invalid or malformed configuration
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate an error message when encountering an invalid or malformed explicit configuration.
The system shall generate an error message when encountering an invalid configuration.
The system shall generate an error if the provided configuration is invalid.

label: Errors should be generated in the absence of a configuration.
absence: action of generating errors in the absence of a configuration.
